SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

ABOUT THIS GAME

The new game will unfold in Paris in the 18th century . Developers presented gamers new assassin Austrian- French origin named Arno Dorian . The game also will be co-op multiplayer for 4 people.

Ubisoft , will take as a storyline events of the French Revolution of 1789, when France switched from a monarchy to a republic. Major events unfolded for 5 years starting from the Bastille and the march on Versailles to the execution of King Louis XVI and the Thermidorian Reaction . It was in this era of class privileges were abolished and were first to declare the rights of man.
Also, the development team has allowed fans to choose the time and place of the action of the game by voting . One of the most popular choices was really the 18th century Paris . Among other options also present Victorian England , Feudal Japan , Imperial Russia , and other countries and timeframes.

Also, the development team has allowed fans to choose the time and place of the action of the game by voting . One of the most popular choices was really the 18th century Paris . Among other options also present Victorian England , Feudal Japan , Imperial Russia , and other countries and timeframes.

You will learn the history of the Arno - boys , by chance became embroiled in the bloody events of the period. You are waiting for new opportunities in the management of this character. Change and the appearance of objects and their characteristics . You will be able to play Assassin's CreedÃ‚Â® Unity with friends , and some tasks to perform even three. Witness the legendary historical events !

FEATURES OF GOLD EDITION

Begin your journey with the game Golden Edition and get the most out of the game content included in it through Season Pass!
More than 5 hours of playing time in the campaign : help Arno restore order in the commune of Saint-Denis (Dead Kings).
